Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which holds immense value to us and has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs. Considering its worth to you and its significance, we propose an offer of $1,200,000 for this product. We believe this price reflects the true value and potential of the item while providing you with an excellent opportunity to acquire it. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,200,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,200,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,500,000
